meanings.sent1: The leathern bag was sturdy and durable.
meanings.sent2: She wore a leathern jacket to protect herself from the cold.
meanings.sent3: The leathern shoes squeaked loudly with each step.
meanings.sent4: His leathern wallet held memories of his travels.
meanings.sent5: The leathern armor gleamed in the sunlight.

meanings.sent1: The leathern fabric had a smooth texture.
meanings.sent2: The chair's leathern upholstery added a touch of elegance to the room.
meanings.sent3: The leathern paint on the walls gave the room a rustic feel.
meanings.sent4: Her leathern gloves were soft to the touch.
meanings.sent5: The leathern sofa looked inviting and comfortable.

meanings.sent1: The craftsman's leathern tools were well-maintained.
meanings.sent2: She admired the leathern craftsmanship of the belt.
meanings.sent3: The leathern scent of the shop reminded him of his childhood.
meanings.sent4: The leathern goods in the store were of high quality.
meanings.sent5: The leathern texture of the book cover felt smooth in his hands.
